EmailTemplate.name: 10/1/2014 Paid ASAs by BSKL Staff
EmailTemplate.subject: Paid ASAs by BSKL Staff
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please find below information about additional paid ASAs by BSKL Staff and links to their respective online registration forms:
Badminton Academy Information (https://school.my.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004SYF/.x3O11fgnmZKLArko4O4j324mKaa5vESiEKJgRsQr28=) Badminton Academy Online Registration Form (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1qlkZ9eLG7V3EBmsHw9mrYjuiVen5FX7eTWSQsyLjuqM/viewform)
Basketball Skills Programme Information (https://school.my.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004SYK/6x9MZmOPR4JBnyq.KPvzpTWUdx4qrvPeaoaz_hrmj1w=) Basketball Skills Programme Online Registration Form (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1LhBssuTdLZXfNCKmMnCkCOhkEaU6UcmZwnsw2mVdzQw/viewform)
Rugby Programme Information (https://school.my.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004SYP/iQJ_llKMVaQMH421OSVS4f7BA5AaBs.b8QZW5uxmO_o=) Rugby Programme Online Registration Form (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1bD6i_869H2P3eSBbCVmorFemltfK-TrDDa2wONstVCQ/viewform)
Saturday Football Development Programme Information (https://school.my.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004SYU/gy4RAEIfncOP1EDiMnGK4qrgbWWf5oWYxwWsmjgXRsg=) Saturday Football Development Programme Online Registration Form (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1rxuBHZQEHOQG6AHDGWNE5Ev6QAVb1xEuqnyuI6RF-Lc/viewform)
Trampolining Club Information (https://school.my.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004SYZ/EvxoTwgtKdzB9q.6.srjJujgo2Cc8kZOAwQiblJgiNY=) Trampolining Club Online Registration Form (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1XfBnkljt25LG1Cio1Dz1h8NObuhhXFA8KJzBRfMUYBc/viewform)
Kind regards
The Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
